FuncDef: This command displays statistical OSPF virtual neighbor information at the configured interval until the configured count is reached.
CLIs: virtual-neighbor <nbr-rtr-id> area <area-id> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address to uniquely identify a neighboring router in the autonomous system. Values-a.b.c.d.
Specifies the OSPF area ID, expressed in dotted decimal notation or as a 32-bit decimal integer. Values-ip-address, 0 to 4294967295.
Configures the interval for each display, in seconds. Values-3 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
